backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend with user profile management, chat session CRUD, and message persistence, all gated by role-based access control (admin/user permissions).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (onboarding screen, three-panel layout, chat message UI, etc.) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference index for the project's frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based light and dark theme CSS custom properties for colors, borders, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Blobby AI app that loads the Inter font, includes the Puter.js v2 CDN script, and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component orchestrating the app flow: shows onboarding on first visit, then login, profile loading, profile setup modal, and finally the main Layout.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessage.tsx: Chat message component that renders user messages as right-aligned indigo bubbles and assistant messages as dark cards with violet glow, supporting a custom markdown parser with code blocks, headings, tables, task-type badges, and image display.
frontend/src/components/ChatWindow.tsx: Main chat interface component that manages local message state, session creation, AI message streaming, and delegates HTML/image previews to parent via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Top-level layout component that composes the sidebar, chat window, and preview panel, and manages session selection, preview state, and user authentication/logout.
frontend/src/components/LoadingIndicator: Simple animated three-dot typing indicator component used to signal AI response generation in progress.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Full-screen login page that presents the Blobby AI branding and triggers Internet Identity authentication via a sign-in button.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component supporting text entry, image attachment (via file picker or drag-and-drop), and send-on-Enter, with auto-resizing textarea and loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingScreen: Welcome/onboarding screen displaying the Blobby AI mascot, tagline, a 'Start Chatting' button, and a grid of suggested prompt cards.
frontend/src/components/PreviewPanel.tsx: A panel component that renders HTML content in a sandboxed iframe (via blob URL) or displays a generated image, with controls for refresh, download, fullscreen, and close.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name on first visit, saving the profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation before calling `onComplete`.
frontend/src/components/PromptCards.tsx: Displays a welcome screen with the Blobby mascot and four clickable prompt suggestion cards (game, image, code, explanation) that populate the chat input when selected.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: A collapsible sidebar listing past chat sessions sorted by recency, with buttons to create a new chat, select an existing session, or delete a session.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor, using an authenticated identity when available or falling back to anonymous, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage Internet Identity authentication state (login, logout, identity persistence) using the DFINITY `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and chat sessions via the backend actor, including get, save, create, delete, and list operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, imports the Inter font, defines a dark violet-themed OKLCH CSS variable palette, and adds custom utility classes and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/services/aiService.ts: Wraps the Puter AI API to provide chat message sending (with optional streaming) and image generation, injecting a system prompt that defines the Blobby AI persona.
frontend/src/utils/codeRenderer.ts: Provides utilities for rendering HTML content in iframes via Blob URLs, downloading HTML files, and extracting HTML from markdown code blocks.
frontend/src/utils/imageHandler.ts: Provides utilities for converting image files to base64, creating and revoking object URLs for thumbnails, and validating image file type and size.
frontend/src/utils/taskClassifier.ts: Classifies user input into task types (Chat, Code, AppBuild, GameBuild, etc.) using regex patterns, and maps each task type to a specific AI model and badge color.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom colors (using oklch CSS variables), fonts, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations. Enables dark mode via class, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for Blobby AI, documenting the app's architecture, tech stack (Puter.js, OpenRouter, Three.js), UI design guidelines, model routing strategy, known issues, and a versioned list of existing implemented features.
